title: Ardvark69
author: Ardvark69
content: With a total network hashrate of 2.69 PH/s (MPS erroneously says 2.92 PH/s due to false data) and a current price of $13 on SafeTrade per token, Iron Fish pays miners $1.39 per 10 GH/s. A 3080 achieves 17.58 GH/s so this results in $2.44 in revenue a day. For reference, a 3080 mining Iron Fish uses approximately 150 watts.  At $0.1/kWh this leads to a power cost of $0.36 for a total profit of $2.08.ZIL Dual Mining will add on $0.1541 but will also reduce your IRON income by 2 minutes resulting in a total profit of $2.15 per 3080.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: Ardvark69 on April 22, 2023, 05:49:16 AMWith a total network hashrate of 2.69 PH/s (MPS erroneously says 2.92 PH/s due to false data) and a current price of $13 on SafeTrade per token, Iron Fish pays miners $1.39 per 10 GH/s. A 3080 achieves 17.58 GH/s so this results in $2.44 in revenue a day. For reference, a 3080 mining Iron Fish uses approximately 150 watts.  At $0.1/kWh this leads to a power cost of $0.36 for a total profit of $2.08.ZIL Dual Mining will add on $0.1541 but will also reduce your IRON income by 2 minutes resulting in a total profit of $2.15 per 3080.So if your calculations are correct I am running a rig with a 3060 ti and a 2060 12 GB which both make the same hash rate as that of a normal 3080 it seems that I missing out and not only me but every one else as it means that just a single card gives you over 60 dollars monthly and if someone has a rig with 6 x 3080 they could make as well as over 360 dollars monthly which is a great amount in these dark times for mining.My question is then,why are people missing out on this opportunity?I see now,the price of it is less than 10 cents and not 13 dollars so your calculations are mostly wrong,both whattomine and minerstat websites show this as greatly unprofitable at the moment.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Wait a few days when the coin is added to all calculators and the profit there will be the same as on other popular coins.IronFish (IRON) Gets Listed on KuCoin! World Premiere!KuCoin is extremely proud to announce yet another great project coming to our trading platform. IronFish (IRON) is now available on KuCoin. Supported trading pair is IRON/USDT.https://www.kucoin.com/ru/news/en-ironfish-iron-gets-listed-on-kucoin-world-premiere

comments.author: P00P135
comments.body: LOL $13 get the fuck outta here

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: P00P135 on April 22, 2023, 03:46:33 PMLOL $13 get the fuck outta hereThis exchange claims that it's worth $13. Never heard of the exchange before, it's my first time hearing about it today, so I don't think I can even trust it  https://safe.trade/trading/ironusdtWorse still, the chart looks weird. 5 minute chart shows that the coin was worth $100+ at some point today and a low of $1 on the same day. Manipulation?

comments.author: P00P135
comments.body: Definitely price manipulation.  Wait for Kucoin price to establish with a lot of volume.

comments.author: sxemini
comments.body: Definitely no price manipulation. Looks normal for me for a new coin listing on a small exchange. Profitability is much higher for me as all other coins, but it will fall in the next days.Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on April 22, 2023, 10:58:30 PMQuote from: P00P135 on April 22, 2023, 03:46:33 PMLOL $13 get the fuck outta hereThis exchange claims that it's worth $13. Never heard of the exchange before, it's my first time hearing about it today, so I don't think I can even trust it  https://safe.trade/trading/ironusdtWorse still, the chart looks weird. 5 minute chart shows that the coin was worth $100+ at some point today and a low of $1 on the same day. comments.author: sxemini
comments.created_time: April 27, 2023, 09:44:57 AMLast edit: April 27, 2023, 10:11:20 AM by sxemini
comments.body: Quote from: P00P135 on April 26, 2023, 09:53:14 PMand its dead.  Explain!!!!Because the price drops? Like KDA, ETHW or ETHF or other shitcoins? Yeah really dead 7 days after mainnet start  Look at the first days on an exchange for Kaspa - it looks like ironfish at the moment.And no i don´t care about Ironfish, but FUD is also bad.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: As soon as the coin was added to the calculators, the profit died  It's time to get used to this, that there is a profit on the coin in the first few days of mining.And the coin algorithm is not the most energy efficient when compared with Кaspa and Radiant coins.
